title: Bangkok: The Forced Clarity (Day 1)
description: A booking mistake turned into a month-long blessing. Landed in Bangkok with an entire month ahead—time to rebuild, reset, and get back to volleyball.

pages.title: Plans for Feb & March — The Bangkok Mistake
pages.description: Context page: Booked the wrong month. Tried to cancel. No luck. Spain was the halfway point. High-level reps and island air. Flight was on time. Now an entire month in Bangkok (Feb 19 - Mar 28), then Miami (Mar 29 - end of May). The mistake forced clarity.

pages.title: Touchdown in Bangkok
pages.description: Arrival sequence at Suvarnabhumi International Airport. Welcome to Thailand. Touchdown in Bangkok with the whole city ahead. Celebration moment on the riverside—made it.

pages.title: Bangkok Ankle Rebuild
pages.description: Mission statement: Duration Feb 20 → Mar 28. Goal: Stability + Pain-Free Back-to-Back Volleyball. Physical recovery and athletic performance as the north star for the month.
